sub_fields.label: Section Name
sub_fields.name: section_name
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a name to distinguish this section from others on this page. The name will not be displayed on the site frontend, but it will be converted to lower case with hyphens instead of spaces and used as the ID for the section, so that a section named "Our Partners" could be linked to with an anchor link like "#our-partners".

sub_fields.label: Link URL
sub_fields.name: link_url
sub_fields.instructions: Please enter full URL including http:// or https://. If you would like to button to send an email, please use the "mailto:" format.

choices.target_blank: Open link in a new window/tab

sub_fields.label: Location
sub_fields.name: location
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the name of a location (e.g. "United States" or "Boston") to limit results. Use "Virtual" to hide search fields and only display online opportunities.

sub_fields.label: Display Facets for Filtering
sub_fields.name: filtering
sub_fields.instructions: Please note that only one section per page may have filtering enabled.

sub_fields.label: Title Keywords
sub_fields.name: title_keywords
sub_fields.instructions: Limit opportunities displayed to those whose titles match these keywords. Leave this field blank to disable filtering by title.

sub_fields.label: Locations
sub_fields.name: vm_locations
sub_fields.instructions:
Enter locations to display opportunities for, one per line, in any of the following formats:
State only "CA"
City, State  "San Francisco, CA"
Zip code "94129"
Leave blank to display opportunities from any location.

sub_fields.label: Organization IDs
sub_fields.name: vm_org_ids
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a comma-separated list of VolunteerMatch organization IDs whose opportunities should be displayed. Leave blank to display opportunities for all organizations.
